title: One World to Hope For
description: A show centered around people who care about each other. It’s about love, compassion, warmth, concern for humanity, and it shows that change can take a long time.
quote: Monica, you’re my daughter, not some alien from another planet.
altHero: man and woman on the couch, the woman is holding a compress to her head
alt3: man and woman talking with mother-in-law
